00010 #ifndef _EVENT_H_
00011 #define _EVENT_H_
00012 
00013 #ifndef _FUNCTOR_H_
00014 #include "FUtils/FUFunctor.h"
00015 #endif // _FUNCTOR_H_
00016 
00017 // Zero argument Event
00018 class FUEvent0
00019 {
00020 private:
00021     typedef IFunctor0<void> Handler;
00022     typedef fm::pvector<Handler> HandlerList;
00023     HandlerList handlers;
00024 
00025 public:
00026     FUEvent0() {}
00027     ~FUEvent0()
00028     {
00029         FUAssert(handlers.empty(), CLEAR_POINTER_VECTOR(handlers));
00030     }
00031 
00032     size_t GetHandlerCount() { return handlers.size(); }
00033 
00034     void InsertHandler(Handler* functor)
00035     {
00036         handlers.push_back(functor);
00037     }
00038 
00040     template <class Class>
00041     void InsertHandler(Class* handle, void (Class::*_function)())
00042     {
00043         handlers.push_back(new FUFunctor0<Class, void>(handle, _function));
00044     }
00045 
00046     template<class Class>
00047     void ReleaseHandler(Class* handle, void (Class::*_function)(void))
00048     {
00049         void* function = *(void**)&_function;
00050         HandlerList::iterator it;
00051         for (it = handlers.begin(); it != handlers.end(); ++it)
00052         {
00053             if ((*it)->Compare(handle, function))
00054             {
00055                 delete (*it);
00056                 handlers.erase(it);
00057                 break;
00058             }
00059         }
00060     }
00061 
00062     void operator()()
00063     {
00064         HandlerList::iterator it;
00065         for (it = handlers.begin(); it != handlers.end(); ++it)
00066         {
00067             (*(*it))();
00068         }
00069     }
00070 };
00071 
00072 // One argument Event
00073 template <typename Arg1>
00074 class FUEvent1
00075 {
00076 private:
00077     typedef IFunctor1<Arg1, void> Handler;
00078     typedef fm::pvector<Handler> HandlerList;
00079     HandlerList handlers;
00080 
00081 public:
00082     FUEvent1() {}
00083 
00084     ~FUEvent1()
00085     {
00086         FUAssert(handlers.empty(), CLEAR_POINTER_VECTOR(handlers));
00087     }
00088 
00089     size_t GetHandlerCount() { return handlers.size(); }
00090 
00091     void InsertHandler(Handler* functor)
00092     {
00093         handlers.push_back(functor);
00094     }
00095 
00097     template <class Class, class _A1>
00098     void InsertHandler(Class* handle, void (Class::*_function)(_A1))
00099     {
00100         handlers.push_back(new FUFunctor1<Class, _A1, void>(handle, _function));
00101     }
00102 
00103     template <class Class, class _A1>
00104     void ReleaseHandler(Class* handle, void (Class::*_function)(_A1))
00105     {
00106         typename HandlerList::iterator it;
00107         void* function = *(void**)&_function;
00108         for (it = handlers.begin(); it != handlers.end(); ++it)
00109         {
00110             if ((*it)->Compare(handle, function))
00111             {
00112                 delete (*it);
00113                 handlers.erase(it);
00114                 break;
00115             }
00116         }
00117     }
00118 
00119     void operator()(Arg1 sArgument1)
00120     {
00121         typename HandlerList::iterator it;
00122         for (it = handlers.begin(); it != handlers.end(); ++it)
00123         {
00124             (*(*it))(sArgument1);
00125         }
00126     }
00127 };

00129 // Two arguments Event
00130 template <typename Arg1, typename Arg2>
00131 class FUEvent2
00132 {
00133 private:
00134     typedef IFunctor2<Arg1, Arg2, void> Handler;
00135     typedef fm::pvector<Handler> HandlerList;
00136     HandlerList handlers;
00137 
00138 public:
00139     FUEvent2() {}
00140 
00141     ~FUEvent2()
00142     {
00143         FUAssert(handlers.empty(), CLEAR_POINTER_VECTOR(handlers));
00144     }
00145 
00146     size_t GetHandlerCount() { return handlers.size(); }
00147 
00148     void InsertHandler(Handler* functor)
00149     {
00150         handlers.push_back(functor);
00151     }
00152 
00154     template <class Class, class _A1, class _A2>
00155     void InsertHandler(Class* handle, void (Class::*_function)(_A1, _A2))
00156     {
00157         handlers.push_back(new FUFunctor2<Class, _A1, _A2, void>(handle, _function));
00158     }
00159 
00161     template <class _A1, class _A2>
00162     void ReleaseHandler(void (*_function)(_A1, _A2))
00163     {
00164         void* function = *(void**)&_function;
00165         typename HandlerList::iterator it;
00166         for (it = handlers.begin(); it != handlers.end(); ++it)
00167         {
00168             if ((*it)->Compare(NULL, function))
00169             {
00170                 delete (*it);
00171                 handlers.erase(it);
00172                 break;
00173             }
00174         }
00175     }
00176 
00178     template <class Class, class _A1, class _A2>
00179     void ReleaseHandler(Class* handle, void (Class::*_function)(_A1, _A2))
00180     {
00181         void* function = *(void**)&_function;
00182         typename HandlerList::iterator it;
00183         for (it = handlers.begin(); it != handlers.end(); ++it)
00184         {
00185             if ((*it)->Compare(handle, function))
00186             {
00187                 delete (*it);
00188                 handlers.erase(it);
00189                 break;
00190             }
00191         }
00192     }
00193 
00194     void operator()(Arg1 sArgument1, Arg2 sArgument2)
00195     {
00196         typename HandlerList::iterator it;
00197         for (it = handlers.begin(); it != handlers.end(); ++it)
00198         {
00199             (*(*it))(sArgument1, sArgument2);
00200         }
00201     }
00202 };
